amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that the plan shall not provide financial benefit to any entity which is allowed any allowance for depletion which is determined under section 613 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to provide that the plan shall not provide financial benefit to any entity which is allowed any allowance for depletion which is determined under section 613 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 256 (Roll no. 79).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Ms. Porter.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 256 (Roll no. 79).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
